---
name: Category Request
about: Request a new prompt category
title: '[CATEGORY] '
labels: category, enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Category Name
The proposed name for the new category.

## Description
A clear and concise description of what this category would contain.

## Icon Suggestion
Suggest an icon from [Lucide Icons](https://lucide.dev/icons/) that would represent this category.
Example: `Code2`, `Sparkles`, `Brain`, `Lightbulb`

## Color Preference
Suggest a color (hex code) for this category.
Example: `#3B82F6` (blue), `#10B981` (green), `#F59E0B` (amber)

## Example Prompts
Provide 3-5 examples of prompts that would fit in this category:
1. Example prompt 1...
2. Example prompt 2...
3. Example prompt 3...

## Justification
Explain why this category is needed and how it differs from existing categories.

## Related Categories
List any existing categories that are similar but distinct from this proposal.
